content:
Hi All. I'm doing a dist upgrade under debian 10 to 11.3, zulip version was 3.2. I'm following https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/upgrade-or-modify.html#upgrading-the-operating-system . and I got errors and warn such like

/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/zulip-puppet-apply -f
Error: Evaluation Error: No matching entry for selector parameter with value '11.3' (file: /home/zulip/deployments/current/puppet/zulip/manifests/base.pp, line: 5, column: 23) on node pdebiantest02.intra.lne

and for this step:

/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/upgrade-zulip-stage-2     /home/zulip/deployments/current/ --ignore-static-assets --audit-fts-indexes

ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement opencv-python-headless==4.3.0.36 (from -r /home/zulip/deployments/current/requirements/thumbor.txt (line 130)) (from versions: 3.4.10.37, 3.4.11.39, 3.4.11.41, 3.4.11.43, 3.4.11.45, 3.4.13.47, 3.4.14.51, 3.4.14.53, 3.4.15.55, 3.4.16.59, 3.4.17.61, 3.4.17.63, 4.3.0.38, 4.4.0.40, 4.4.0.42, 4.4.0.44, 4.4.0.46, 4.5.1.48, 4.5.2.52, 4.5.2.54, 4.5.3.56, 4.5.4.58, 4.5.4.60, 4.5.5.62, 4.5.5.64)
ERROR: No matching distribution found for opencv-python-headless==4.3.0.36 (from -r /home/zulip/deployments/current/requirements/thumbor.txt (line 130))
WARNING: You are using pip version 20.1.1; however, version 22.0.4 is available.
You should consider upgrading via the '/srv/zulip-venv-cache/25c937dd999544867eef0647802400b5d5825c56/zulip-thumbor-venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip' command.

Error running a subcommand of /home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/create-thumbor-venv: /srv/zulip-venv-cache/25c937dd999544867eef0647802400b5d5825c56/zulip-thumbor-venv/bin/pip install --no-deps --require-hashes --requirement /home/zulip/deployments/current/requirements/thumbor.txt
Actual error output for the subcommand is just above this.

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/setup_venv.py", line 335, in do_setup_virtualenv
    install_venv_deps(pip, requirements_file)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/setup_venv.py", line 101, in install_venv_deps
    run([pip, "install", "--no-deps", "--require-hashes", "--requirement", requirements_file])
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/zulip_tools.py", line 198, in run
    subprocess.check_call(args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.9/subprocess.py", line 373, in check_call
    raise CalledProcessError(retcode, cmd)
subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command '['/srv/zulip-venv-cache/25c937dd999544867eef0647802400b5d5825c56/zulip-thumbor-venv/bin/pip', 'install', '--no-deps', '--require-hashes', '--requirement', '/home/zulip/deployments/current/requirements/thumbor.txt']' returned non-zero exit status 1.

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/create-thumbor-venv", line 32, in <module>
    cached_venv_path = setup_virtualenv(
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/setup_venv.py", line 294, in setup_virtualenv
    do_setup_virtualenv(cached_venv_path, requirements_file)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/setup_venv.py", line 339, in do_setup_virtualenv
    install_venv_deps(pip, requirements_file)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/setup_venv.py", line 101, in install_venv_deps
    run([pip, "install", "--no-deps", "--require-hashes", "--requirement", requirements_file])
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/zulip_tools.py", line 198, in run
    subprocess.check_call(args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.9/subprocess.py", line 373, in check_call
    raise CalledProcessError(retcode, cmd)
subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command '['/srv/zulip-venv-cache/25c937dd999544867eef0647802400b5d5825c56/zulip-thumbor-venv/bin/pip', 'install', '--no-deps', '--require-hashes', '--requirement', '/home/zulip/deployments/current/requirements/thumbor.txt']' returned non-zero exit status 1.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/upgrade-zulip-stage-2", line 154, in <module>
    subprocess.check_call([os.path.join(deploy_path, "scripts", "lib", "create-thumbor-venv"),
  File "/usr/lib/python3.9/subprocess.py", line 373, in check_call
    raise CalledProcessError(retcode, cmd)

I tried these commands:

pip install -U pip setuptools wheel
pip install opencv-contrib-python

But, I get always same errors and warn. some helps would be appreciated.

thanks a lot

PS: is that possible to migrate to a docker installation and update after that???
@lne one can migrate to a Docker container using the backup tool, but you need to be running the same version on the two instances, so it's likely easiest to upgrade your existing instance first.
Can you post the full /var/log/zulip/upgrade.log from the system?
I would recommend upgrading to Zulip 4.11 and then upgrading the OS.

We removed the opencv dependency (as we no longer support thumbor due to it being unmaintained upstream and in particular does not fully support the Python 3 required by Debian 11), and my guess is the exception you're seeing is related to that.
Indeed, the first step of https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/upgrade-or-modify.html#upgrading-from-debian-10-to-11 is to upgrade to the latest 4.x release, I think for this reason.

Tim Abbott said:

Can you post the full /var/log/zulip/upgrade.log from the system?

humm... I've reversed the VM to a snapshoot. I'll try to replay the upgrade process to get that file.

Tim Abbott said:

I would recommend upgrading to Zulip 4.11 and then upgrading the OS.

Ok, I'll try this.
upgrade.log.bz2

I failed to get 5.xx upgrade logs, but I got 4.11 upgrade logs with errors. I tried 

/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/upgrade-zulip zulip-server-4.11.tar.gz

that may not be the good method.....
oups, sorry, I'm running out of disk space ....

now
zulip update to 4.11 OK
OS distupgrade to 11.3 OK
zulip update to 5.xx NOK with

/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/upgrade-zulip-stage-2 /home/zulip/deployments/current/ --ignore-static-assets --audit-fts-indexes

+ virtualenv -p python3 --no-download /srv/zulip-venv-cache/c51959e129e17cf26d9faab706ef7bd2cba59212/zulip-py3-venv
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/create-production-venv", line 36, in <module>
    os.path.join(args.deploy_path, venv_name), os.path.join(ZULIP_PATH, "requirements", "prod.txt")
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/setup_venv.py", line 305, in setup_virtualenv
    do_setup_virtualenv(cached_venv_path, requirements_file)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/setup_venv.py", line 333, in do_setup_virtualenv
    run_as_root(["virtualenv", "-p", "python3", "--no-download", venv_path])
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/zulip_tools.py", line 523, in run_as_root
    run(args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/zulip_tools.py", line 228, in run
    subprocess.check_call(args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 342, in check_call
    retcode = call(*popenargs, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 323, in call
    with Popen(*popenargs, **kwargs) as p:
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 775, in __init__
    restore_signals, start_new_session)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 1522, in _execute_child
    raise child_exception_type(errno_num, err_msg, err_filename)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'virtualenv': 'virtualenv'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/upgrade-zulip-stage-2", line 201, in <module>
    [os.path.join(deploy_path, "scripts", "lib", "create-production-venv"), deploy_path]
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/subprocess.py", line 347, in check_call
    raise CalledProcessError(retcode, cmd)
subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command '['/home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/lib/create-production-venv', '/home/zulip/deployments/current/']' returned non-zero exit status 1.
Did you follow our all of our directions for upgrading the OS? (It is not just apt dist-upgrade.)

Anders Kaseorg said:

Did you follow our all of our directions for upgrading the OS? (It is not just apt dist-upgrade.)

yes, and I got those errors at step 5.
Can you run sudo apt-get install python3-virtualenv and try again?

well, that's not necessary. I finally got all up to date. the problem was I had a proxy issue.
since I had a very old version, I had to make update from 3.xx to 4.11 -> 4.9 -> 5.0 -> latest
thanks a lot for your answer and helps.
but, I always have a question about docker. what do you think about a migration into a docker container ? is updating easier within a docker ??
3.xx -> 4.11 -> 5.0 -> latest

I got some troubles when I updated zulip. so the good process would be 3.xx->4.0 -> 4.11 -> 5.0 -> latest -> disupgrade debian -> follow the document https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/upgrade-or-modify.html#upgrading-from-debian-10-to-11. hope that can help someone
You can upgrade directly from the latest 3.x release to the latest 5.x release. Thereâ€™s no need to insert extra .0 releases.
Yeah, and in fact, we recommend always doing so, because often the main difference between 4.0 and 4.2 is that we fixed all the bugs folks reported in the upgrade process.
